errors.error_description: The README provides an incorrect PyPI package name `photoutils` for installation, which will fail due to a typo.
correction_candidates: Install using the correct package name: `pip install photutils`.
The package should be installed from source: `git clone https://github.com/astropy/photutils.git && python setup.py install`.
Use conda to install the package: `conda install -c conda-forge photutils`.
The package name is `astro-photutils`, so run `pip install astro-photutils`.
errors.golden_answer: Install using the correct package name: `pip install photutils`.
